name: @hopin/hugo-styleguide
description: This repo contains a theme and content to generate a styleguide for hugo themes

scripts.build: rm -rf build/ && mkdir -p build/ && npm run copy && tsc && node rollup.js
scripts.build-example: npm run build && rm -rf test/example-site/themes/styleguide/ && rm -rf test/example-site/content && rm -rf test/example-site/public && cp -r build test/example-site/themes/styleguide && cp -r content test/example-site/content && cd test/example-site && hugo --environment development
scripts.copy: cp -r src/layouts/ build/layouts/ && cp -r src/assets/ build/assets && cp -r src/static/ build/static && cp README.md build/README.md && cp theme.toml build/theme.toml && cp update.sh build/update.sh
